name: Time Cycle (LaptopCoder11)
description:
A Short puzzle game where you can switch between two sides of the world using an hourglass to solve puzzles.

WASD/Arrows to move. Space key to interact with stuff. Change between the two sides of this world by flipping the hourglass to solve puzzles.

Please comment to give feedback! :)

Made for the BenBonk Game Jam #3
